structure.unit: GENERAL PROVISIONS CONCERNING CRIMES AND PUNISHMENTS

law.catch_line: Attachment of commission to Office of the Attorney General.
law.text: For administrative purposes only, the Kentucky Multidisciplinary Commission on Child Sexual Abuse shall be attached to the Office of the Attorney General.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 308, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.
